title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate, 4-28-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 28, 2009

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate, 4-28-09




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                   April 28, 2009  NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:   Rebecca M. Blank, of Maryland, to be Under Secretary of Commerce for Economic Affairs, vice Cynthia A. Glassman, resigned.   Robert S. Litt, of Maryland, to be General Counsel of the Office of the Director of National Intelligence, vice Benjamin A. Powell, resigned.   Laurie I. Mikva, of Illinois, to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Legal Services Corporation for a term expiring July 13, 2010, vice Florentino Subia, term expired.   Paul N. Stockton, of California, to be an Assistant Secretary of Defense, vice Paul McHale, resigned.
